ygData.subject: Re: Plane of Knowledge NPC's
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks. That is very helpful. Got a list of NPC s and locations through that for the needle quest. seems to be the beginning of several other quests. Again,
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks. That is very helpful. Got a list of NPC's and locations
through that for the needle quest. seems to be the beginning of
several other quests. Again, very helpful.

Barto

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Claude P Perry II"
<crhydderch@a...> wrote:
> In addition to this a lot of the quests require you to be a
certainlevel in
> order to do them. If you go to
> http://everquest.allakhazam.com/db/qsearch.html?zone=158 at
Allakhazam's you
> will see alist of all the quests available and what levels for PoK
>
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "Thomas H. Comegys" <tcomegys@s...>
>
>
> > It's possible that you do not have good enough PoK faction for
these NPCs
> to
> > continue and actually offer you a quest. A possible solution is
the
> "sewing
> > needles for Willamina" quest. Talk to Willamina (loc neg 415, pos
1160),
> and
> > she sends you off on a Fed Ex quest involving 9 other NPCs, all
in PoK.
> >
> > You finally get a book from her that, in addition to some minor
stats,
> also
> > contains something called a "faction modifier", which I am
assuming
> modifies
> > PoK faction to the point that others will give you quests, i.e.
continue
> > their conversations further.
> >
> > I have written down the names and locs of all the NPCs, if you
want them.
> >
> > Froondor
